title: 107_hr489
content: Math and Science Teacher Recruitment Act of 2001 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish new programs of student guaranteed and direct loan forgiveness for middle and secondary school mathematics and science teachers in public or private nonprofit schools. Requires for eligibility: (1) at least three consecutive complete school years of such teaching. (2) an undergraduate or graduate degree in mathematics, life or physical sciences, technology, or engineering, and (3) State certification or license.
